assessment_item.i18n: {"en":{"NO_ANSWER":"Click the answer and then press the submit button","QUESTION_TEXT":"Which of the triangle is never possible to draw?","HINT_ID":"Think of the sides and angles of the triangles","OPT_0":"An obtuse equilateral triangle","MH_0":"Excellent!","OPT_1":"An acute equilateral triangle","MH_1":"All equilateral triangles are acute triangle as each of the angles measure $num1Â°.","OPT_2":"An obtuse scalene triangle","MH_2":"A triangle can have an obtuse angle and all the three sides different.","OPT_3":"An acute scalene triangle","MH_3":"A triangle can have all the angles acute and all the sides different.","EXPRESSIONS":"$num1=random(60,60)"}}
